Climate change, however, threatens the archaeological record as environmental change increases erosion rates and intensifies or accelerates the effects of flooding, wildfires, invasive species, and drought (e.g., Marzeion & Levermann, 2014). These stresses add to ongoing pressures from development (Morgan, Rockman, Smith, & Meadow, 2016).
